description.raw:
In this PR I address [[CLOUD-74]](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-74).

A new dropdown element that uses `paper-dropdown` was made in order to list and select Amazon EC2 Instance Types.

If any field of Simulator or Field Computer is empty when the user clicks the continue button, a warning is fired. This was also done in [Pull Request #157](#!/osrf/cloudsim-widgets/pull-requests/157/amazon-region-dropdown).

ptal @chapulina
fyi @andres_fortier

Screenshots:

Normal view.
![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912186557.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1692171669-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912186557.png)

Opening the Hardware Dropdown.
![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912206528.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/2812170944-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912206528.png)

Simulator's empty fields warning.
![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912253777.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/4072612881-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912253777.png)

Field Computer's empty fields warning.
![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912281683.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/4268300129-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1493912281683.png)
